thread.title: The One Trend Will Be Huge This Year And Where To Get It From
thread.title_full: The One Trend Will Be Huge This Year And Where To Get It From

title: The One Trend Will Be Huge This Year And Where To Get It From
text: facebook 735 SHARES Statement sleeves. These are everywhere! From our favourite celeb, to every second fashion blogger, everyone is wearing them. For all we know, this trend is not going anywhere any time soon. We love them because they add just the right amount of drama to the outfit! It is always fun to play with the style of the sleeves. Bell sleeves or ruffles, bishop sleeves or flounce, we want them all. Here are some of our favourite pieces on the Internet right now! 1. This basic black with flowy bell sleeves.
